title: Response to ‘This Non-Religious Life – Episode 3’ on YouTube
post:
Thanks for taking the time to post your reaction to our show, This Non-Religious Life (http://Radio.Zombie-Popcorn.com). 
   Ken sent you an email a couple weeks back inviting you to come on our show so we can have a proper discussion about the Shroud of Turin but we have not heard from you. 
 The invitation is still open.
We look forward to hearing from you.
author: Bayless
